categoryDescription: Metals containing iron, known for their strength and durability.

commodities.name: Hot-Rolled Coil Steel
commodities.description: Commonly used for structural components and frames.

commodities.name: Cold-Rolled Coil Steel
commodities.description: Provides a better surface finish and tighter tolerances than HRC.

commodities.name: Stainless Steel (304)
commodities.description: Corrosion-resistant steel alloy used for exhaust systems and trim.

commodities.name: Pig Iron
commodities.description: The raw iron produced from a blast furnace, used to make steel.

categoryDescription: Metals that do not contain iron, valued for properties like light weight and conductivity.

commodities.name: Aluminum
commodities.description: Lightweight metal for body panels, engine blocks, and wheels.

commodities.name: Copper
commodities.description: Essential for electrical wiring, radiators, and motors.

commodities.name: Zinc
commodities.description: Primarily used for galvanizing steel to prevent corrosion.

commodities.name: Lead
commodities.description: Mainly used in lead-acid batteries.

commodities.name: Nickel
commodities.description: A key component in batteries for electric vehicles and stainless steel alloys.

commodities.name: Tin
commodities.description: Used in coatings and solders.

commodities.name: Magnesium
commodities.description: Ultra-lightweight metal for die-casting and transmission cases.

commodities.name: Titanium
commodities.description: High-strength, lightweight metal for high-performance applications.

categoryDescription: Synthetic materials used for a wide range of interior and exterior components.

commodities.name: Polypropylene (PP)
commodities.description: Used for bumpers, dashboards, and battery cases.

commodities.name: Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)
commodities.description: Rigid plastic for interior trim, grilles, and wheel covers.

commodities.name: Polycarbonate (PC)
commodities.description: Strong, impact-resistant plastic for headlight lenses and trim.

commodities.name: Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC)
commodities.description: Used for wire insulation, dashboards, and door panels.

commodities.name: Polyethylene (PE)
commodities.description: Used for fuel tanks and cable insulation.

categoryDescription: Materials made from two or more constituent materials with different properties.

commodities.name: Carbon Fiber Reinforced Polymer (CFRP)
commodities.description: High-strength, low-weight material for performance body panels and chassis.

commodities.name: Glass Fiber Reinforced Polymer (GFRP)
commodities.description: Used for body panels, leaf springs, and structural components.

categoryDescription: Liquids and chemicals used in vehicle operation and manufacturing.

commodities.name: Crude Oil (Brent)
commodities.description: Base for gasoline, diesel, and lubricants.

commodities.name: Lubricating Oils
commodities.description: Engine oils, transmission fluids, and greases.

commodities.name: Paints & Coatings
commodities.description: Automotive paints, clear coats, and corrosion protection.

commodities.name: Adhesives & Sealants
commodities.description: Structural adhesives for body-in-white and sealants.

categoryDescription: Components forming the electrical and electronic systems of a vehicle.

commodities.name: Semiconductors (ECUs, MCUs)
commodities.description: Microchips for engine control, infotainment, and ADAS.

commodities.name: Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs)
commodities.description: Boards that connect electronic components.

categoryDescription: Flexible polymers used for seals, hoses, and tires.

commodities.name: Natural Rubber
commodities.description: Primary component for tires.

commodities.name: Synthetic Rubber (EPDM, SBR)
commodities.description: Used for seals, hoses, belts, and weatherstripping.
